original_title: 三十路童貞の僕がチ●ポバカになった頃には新卒社員がイキ果てていた記憶ゼロの暴走ピストン相部屋 SEX経験無しをからかわれた事は覚えています（怒） 星宮一花
overview: Drunk and arrogant Ichika is the very best. So fitting and believable.  The banging scenes were also top-tier, thanks to her crazy good body.  Juicy.
title: I’m A Cherry Boy In My Thirties And I’m Sharing A Room For Intense Sex With A New Employee That remembered nothing. But I Remember Being Made Fun Of (Lingering Anger). Ichika Hoshimiya
